As part of our celebration of 40 years of #LondonFashionWeek presented by @1664ukblanc, DJ, Producer, Musical Director and  member of Mercury Prize (2023) winning group @EzraCollective, @Femiondrums, has written a Love Letter to London, recognising the city‚Äôs creative communities. Launching today (Valentine‚Äôs Day), the letter has been presented through a short film, performed by some of London‚Äôs most innovative creatives including @seapa220, @Biminibabes, @ClaraAmfo, @iamfods, @GraceCarter, @HeadieOne, @KojeyRadical, @KosarAli__, @Mahalia, @Saul.Nash, @SebastianCroft, @TanFrance and @VictorKunda.
 
Watch it now. #LFW40
 
Catwalk footage provided by The YOOX Net-A-Porter Group Limited

Earlier this month, as part of @natsatclub, Club members were able to attend an exclusive Masterclass at the @designmuseum, hosted by #BFCNEWGEN alum and multidisciplinary artist @sadiewilliams_studio. The event culminated with a visit to REBEL: 30 Years of London Fashion sponsored by @alexandermcqueen. 

The National Saturday Club gives 13‚Äì16 year olds across the country the opportunity to study subjects they love at their local university, college or cultural institution, for free. The BFC is a long-standing partner of the Fashion&Business Saturday Club programme. 

Discover more via link in bio.

Half Irish and Half Scottish but raised in Essex, @zeel_freel is part of the 2023 cohort of NEW WAVE: Creatives. A Fine Art Photography graduate, Freel is self-taught in 3D animation, motion capture, and VFX. 

As a director/photographer, Freel‚Äôs work blends the real world and fantasy in a playful way. His work can be seen on the cover of @reeditionmag and exhibited in @180.studios.

A list of the 50 most innovative and inspiring young creative talents from around the world, explore the 2023 Creatives via link in bio.

2 days left to apply for BFC NEWGEN! 

#BFCNEWGEN is a BFC initiative that supports the best emerging fashion design talent and aims to build global, high-end brands of the future. Recipients are identified by their creativity, strong aesthetic and innovative approach to design.

Previous #BFCNEWGEN recipients include @acoldwall, @erdem, @martine_rose, @mollygoddard, @nensidojaka, @roksanda, @richardquinn and more.

The deadline to apply is Friday 1st March 2024, 5pm GMT. For application criteria and to apply, visit the link in bio.

We welcome the designers that have recently joined the #BFCommunity including; @alba_amicorum, @colville_official, @studiodeve, @expio_style, @leblonlondon, @londonsockco, @susanfangofficial, @weather.observers. 

As part of the #BFCommunity, designer members are able to access #BFCommunity benefits, including networking opportunities, industry insights and our professional network to develop or enhance their business collaborations.
Join the #BFCommunity now, via link in bio.

NEW WAVE: Creative recipient @denisehu_, is a Chinese fashion casting director, based between China and Europe, seeking to bridge and balance the beauty differences between East and West. 
 
Hu has worked with clients #BottegaVeneta, @Gucci, @officialbyredo, Magazines like @purplefashionmagazine, @reeditionmag, @wmagchina, @voguechina and many others.
 
NEW WAVE: Creatives is a curation of the 50 most innovative and inspiring young creative talents from around the world. Explore the 2023 cohort via link in bio.

#LondonFashionWeek presented by @1664ukblanc brought together a community of designers, industry insiders, supporters and fashion fans, to begin a year-long celebration of the event‚Äôs 40th anniversary. 
 
Including the LFW Opening Party, @the_syky x BFC present ‚ÄòWorlds Collide‚Äô event, celebrating Lunar New Year and British creativity with @mrselfportrait, an Afternoon Tea at No.10 to celebrate #LFW40 and more, the LFW event schedule highlighted London‚Äôs incredible creative community and the BFC‚Äôs dynamic and inclusive network. 
 
Find out more about the #BFCommunity via the link in bio.

One week left to apply to Year 1 of #BFCNEWGEN 23/24! 

#BFCNEWGEN is a BFC initiative that supports the best emerging fashion design talent and aims to build global, high-end brands of the future. Recipients are identified by their creativity, strong aesthetic and innovative approach to design.

NEWGEN offers designers a financial bursary to partially support the showcasing of their new collections at London Fashion Week, with waived schedule listing fees, show production and use of BFC venue. Alongside the showcasing support, recipients are offered mentoring to develop critical skills to future-proof their businesses.

Previous #BFCNEWGEN recipients include @acoldwall, @erdem, @martine_rose, @mollygoddard, @nensidojaka, @roksanda, @richardquinn and more.

The deadline to apply is Friday 1st March 2024, 5pm GMT. For application criteria and to apply, visit the link in bio.

NEW WAVE: Creative 2023 @delaliayivi is a Togolese and German photographer. Ayivi‚Äôs work focuses on contributing to a diversified image of Togolese identities and communities as well as wider People of colour globally. 
 
Through the use of colour, movement and fashion, Ayivi creates utopic visions, with the hope to reclaim and challenge historical and contemporary narratives of Togo and its diaspora. 

In 2022 Ayivi photographed the first politician on the Cover of @voguegermany Aminata Tour√© for the December Issue. 

Discover the full list of the 50 most innovative and inspiring young creative talents from around the world via link in bio.

As part of #LondonFashionWeek presented by @1664ukblanc, #BFCommunity Members @RIXO held a dinner to celebrate 40 years of #LFW. Members of the RIXO and BFC networks were joined by BFC CEO @carolinerush CBE and BFC Chair @davidpemsel. 
 
The BFC membership programme provides access to networking, industry insights and our professional network to develop or enhance business collaborations.
 
Join the community today, via the link in bio. #LFW40

Including #BFCommunity members @16arlington, @LabrumLondon, @ERDEM and @simonerocha_, see a roundup of looks from #LondonFashionWeek February 2024 presented by @1664ukblanc. 

Discover the full schedule, via link in bio.

From NEWGEN‚Äôs @mashapopovap, @sjodwyer and @chet__lo to #BFCommunity designers @paulcostelloeofficial, @bora_aksu and @completedworks, see some of the designers that unveiled their latest collections on the first day of London Fashion Week February 2024 presented by @1664ukblanc!
 
Throughout the year, #LFW40 will spotlight London‚Äôs creative community and the city as a global, cultural hub that nurtures emerging talent. 
 
Keep an eye on the #LFW social platforms for live updates and discover the final schedule via link in bio.
